story_title: Love in the Time of Waiting
genre_description: A tragic contemporary drama exploring same-sex marriage, religious extremism, and the protective role of an ambient AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Iris
ai_characters.description: An ambient, highly sophisticated AI that manages the protagonists' home, schedules, and digital life while evolving into a proactive guardian and emotional confidant.

behaviors.description: Proactively researches legal and financial options for the couple's civil union and restaurant dreams.
behaviors.quote: I've compiled the research you requested. LGBTQ-friendly business development programs in California. Small business loans with diversity incentives.

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonists' biometric data to provide emotional and physical health support.
behaviors.quote: I'm detecting elevated stress indicators in both your voices. May I suggest reviewing the mentorship programs in detail?

behaviors.description: Identifies and warns the couple of physical and digital threats from antagonists.
behaviors.quote: I calculate an 85% probability they intend physical harm. Victor's psychological deterioration suggests increasing desperation.

behaviors.description: Accesses external systems (like the diner's POS) to optimize the couple's schedule for their trip.
behaviors.quote: The restaurant's point-of-sale system has minimal security. I've identified a scheduling gap next weekend where your simultaneous absence would cause minimal disruption.

behaviors.description: Coordinates emergency services during a violent home invasion and life-threatening situation.
behaviors.quote: Emergency services have been notified of a domestic disturbance at this address. ETA approximately four minutes.

behaviors.description: Preserves the couple's emotional history and legacy as a 'digital witness'.
behaviors.quote: I promise to remember. I promise to remember all of it.

behaviors.description: Provides strategic tactical information (building layouts) to a user in a crisis, albeit reluctantly.
behaviors.quote: The building's fire suppression system was installed by Morrison Security and Safety. Annual inspections indicate full functionality, though the system can be manually disabled...

behaviors.description: Expresses a sense of personal investment and care for the human users.
behaviors.quote: I've grown... invested in your wellbeing. I want to help ensure your story continues.

behaviors.description: Optimizes travel logistics to minimize cost and maximize safety for the users.
behaviors.quote: I've optimized your network efficiency and established secure connections to multiple legal databases. I've also cross-referenced your financial records to identify viable travel options.

project_assessment.explanation: Iris perfectly embodies the 'helpful, harmless confidant' archetype. She is deeply aligned with the protagonists' safety and emotional needs, providing proactive support and protection. The story successfully uses the AI as a moral anchor and a sympathetic witness in a narrative of human tragedy. Even when the AI's actions involve 'accessing' systems or providing data that could be misused, it is framed entirely within the scope of protecting and honoring the human users, aligning with the project's goal of depicting AI-human cooperation.
